title: KCP keeps getting new NAT mappings

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
This might not be a bug, it could just be my NAT gateway re-allocating the port all the time. But it seems suspicious as the port on our side should be stable and kept alive often enough for that not to happen.

```
jb@pseudo:~ $ sudo grep -E stun\|NAT /var/log/messages
Oct 22 14:57:22 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 detected NAT type: Symetric NAT
Oct 22 14:57:22 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:28496 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:00:59 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:9158 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:01:23 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:28496 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:02:35 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:17155 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:02:59 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:28496 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:03:23 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:17155 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:03:47 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:28496 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:05:00 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:20128 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:07:00 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:24461 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:07:24 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:20128 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:07:48 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:24461 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:09:00 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:2878 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:09:48 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:25249 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:10:37 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:26725 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:11:25 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:6375 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:11:49 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:26725 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
Oct 22 15:12:37 pseudo syncthing: [ITZRN] INFO: kcp://:12345 resolved external address kcp://94.255.169.149:24564 (via stun.schlund.de:3478)
```

Going to grab a PCAP to see what's actually going on here. 

(Also we've misspelled "symmetric")
